column5: Heading north to Savant Lake area the 9th. As usual, I arrived in Canada earlier than expected. This morning, my mind and spirit are sipping coffee on the dock of a sweet walleye lake; patiently awaiting the arrival of the rest of me along with my gear.\ (My wife finds this “here/not here” thing really annoying.) After summer blew by at at light speed-I swear, I blinked and it was September-now I’m like a kid waiting for Christmas…can’t sleep, can’t focus, can’t wait, and time is going soooo slooowly. -Rev
Get a bigger motor. The faster you go, the slower time goes.
It was awesome! Like a week trapped in what I imagine heaven must be like.
